articles.author: Associated Press
articles.title: US-born China pop star Wang Leehom apologizes in scandal - Yahoo News
articles.description: An Asian American who is one of the biggest pop stars in China apologized to his family and fans on Monday and said he will take a break from performing...
articles.content: BEIJING (AP) An Asian American who is one of the biggest pop stars in China apologized to his family and fans on Monday and said he will take a break from performing after a public dispute on social … [+1117 chars]
